fields.name: Academic Probation:
fields.value: Use during the day phase. Name a score cutoff. This ability is astral. If you score below the cutoff yourself, this ability fails. This ability may not be used successfully two days in a row. *If you are town,* town members scoring more than 10% below the cutoff, and all others scoring below the cutoff, will be roleblocked tonight. *If you are mafia,* mafia members scoring more than 20% below the cutoff, and all others scoring more than 10% below the cutoff, will be roleblocked tonight.

fields.name: Remediation (1x, Charge 75%):
fields.value: Use during the day phase. Your target will be informed they must submit two responses tonight, and only the lower scoring response will count. If your target does not submit two responses, this counts as a DNP.

fields.name: Report Card (Charge 50%):
fields.value: Use during the evening phase. Learn your target's exact defense score at the beginning of the night.
